item.description:
Join us for another special event Salsa Y Control Vinyl Jam Session Social. This monthly event is one of the most popular in Boston!
THE EVENT IS ON THE THIRD FLOOR!! We will meet on the third floor in the lobby by the elevators.

NO LESSON! Just a reminder that this event does not have a lesson before hand. It is a social not a club night.

Social Dancing from 6pm to 9pm!
Dance Performances TBD
Dance to the best old school salsa, mambo, and chachacha provided by DJ Sonerito and DJ Johnny G. We will be spinning VINYL!!! Plus Guest DJs D. MARTINEZ, DJ SAOKO AND DJ WALTER!
SIMPLY THE HOTTEST SOCIAL IN BOSTON SPINNING VINYL.
As always, there will also be percussion instruments available for those that know how to play them! Timbales, Congas, Bongos, Maracas, Guiro, etc. This will trully be a Jam Session!
$8 ADMISSION TO SOCIAL. ALL AGES WELCOME
Refreshments for purchase!
For More Info: 617-312-6464 or info@salsaycontrol.com
item.how_to_find_us: THE EVENT IS ON THE THIRD FLOOR!! We will meet on the third floor in the lobby by the elevators.
